summary: Premium makeup e-commerce website with mobile-friendly app-like design, dark/light mode toggle, video background hero section, AI shade scanner with photo upload and multimodal vision analysis, product grid with hover effects, slide-in cart drawer with auto-calculation, WhatsApp checkout integration, and a header search bar with real-time product grid filtering
architectural_notes: Mobile-first responsive design with hamburger navigation
Theme switching system for dark/light modes
Video autoplay background with muted audio
File upload system for AI shade scanner
Multimodal vision API integration for shade analysis
Shopping cart state management with real-time calculations
WhatsApp Web API integration using wa.me links
Real-time search filtering on product grid via header search input
